metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items rejected
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items rejected") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items incomplete
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items incomplete") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items with confirmation date later than requested delivery date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items with confirmation date later than requested delivery date") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items created later than sales order items
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase requisition items created later than sales order items") * 100

metrics.name: Open purchase order items with confirmed delivery date in sales order in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open purchase order items with confirmed delivery date in sales order in the past") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items deleted
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items deleted") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipt posted after confirmed delivery date in sales order
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Goods receipt posted after confirmed delivery date in sales order") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order item stock exists
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order item stock exists") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items created") * 100

metrics.name: Goods issue posted after confirmed delivery date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Goods issue posted after confirmed delivery date") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created before goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items created before goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoice created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Supplier invoice created") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoice created before goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoice created before goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoice created but no customer invoice yet
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoice created but no customer invoice yet") * 100

metrics.name: Customer invoice created later than supplier invoice
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Customer invoice created later than supplier invoice") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Purchase requisition items created") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Purchase requisition items created")

metrics.name: Purchase order items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Purchase order items created") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Purchase order items created")

metrics.name: Goods receipt posted (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Goods receipt posted") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipt posted (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Goods receipt posted")

metrics.name: Goods issue posted (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Goods issue posted") * 100

metrics.name: Goods issue posted (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Goods issue posted")

metrics.name: Customer invoice items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Customer invoice items created") * 100

metrics.name: Customer invoice items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Customer invoice items created")

metrics.name: Create sales order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create sales order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create purchase requisition item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create purchase requisition item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Convert purchase requisition item into purchase order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Convert purchase requisition item into purchase order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods receipt into sales order item stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods receipt into sales order item stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods issue from sales order stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods issue from sales order stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Receive supplier invoice
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Receive supplier invoice')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create customer invoice
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create customer invoice')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
